This chunk is situated within the documentation of the `draw_in_front` method in the `Actor` class. The method controls the rendering order of actor parts, placing specific geometry in different bins to achieve front-to-back ordering effects.

If mode > 0, the frontPart geometry is placed in the 'fixed'
        bin, with the indicated drawing order.  This will cause it to
        be drawn after almost all other geometry.  In this case, the
        backPartName is actually unused.
